intro: These toys are scattered everywhere! Can you fit them all back into the toybox? ToyBox Puzzle has 100 colorful levels guaranteed to challenge your critical thinking skills.
description:
We had so much fun playing with all these toys, but we can't just leave all of this mess behind! Don't worry though, the excitement is not over yet, we're about to learn how organizing your mess can be a whole new way of having fun.

* Practice your organization skills and critical thinking with simple to understand puzzles. Just pick up and drop all the toys into the toy box, and try to get everything to fit inside.
* More than 100 levels and 54 different types of toys to organize. There are many unique shapes and designs that appear throughout the levels for you to discover.
* Cute and colorful puzzles that are fun for a younger audience, and challenging for the entire family.
* Did you beat all the levels? Surprise! There's even more! New levels with extra challenge and a secret ending are waiting for you.
* Fun soundtrack and toy sound effects made specially for the game.
